name: Carolyn Sherer
text: They have a great selection of products. Unfortunately we are in a pandemic and the staff and customers did not wear masks. It is mandated by law in our state. I asked why they  did not wear masks, and the owner replied that they weren't around a lot of people. This was a high risk environment.

resp.text: Thank you for visiting our store during your beach vacation.  I'm glad the 3 unmasked people in the store when you arrived did not deter you from shopping for 30+ minutes, I appreciate your purchases.  Had you mentioned your discomfort right away, instead of as you were leaving we could have accommodated you.  I can assure you 2 of the unmasked people (my mother & I) have not been to any other stores, malls, restaurants, riots, protests, doctor appointments, or on a vacation in over a year.  I hope that you are giving poor reviews to all the other 'high risk' businesses you encounter. (or are you just trying to negatively impact small businesses?)

name: lacey rinks
text: You wouldn't let a disabled person come in your store? How low of a person could you really be. I wouldn't reccomend anyone giving this person without a heart a penny of my money.

name: Anna Harris
text: The owners say weird things to their customers and seem pretty stuck up.

name: J LaPointe
text: Great selection, well organized, and friendly owner. Can't go wrong here!

name: Arielle Jay
text: This place is a Must-Visit for anyone who works with beads and crafts jewelry. While there are many craft stores like Hobby Lobby, Joanne's, Michael's, and even a section in Wal-Mart Supercenter that offer beads, wire, etc., you definitely don't want to miss this great little shop. It's thorough dedication to the bead craft ensures that even if you may not find exactly what you're looking for, there should be some wonderful alternatives. Not only is the selection vast and great, but the quality is impeccable and picked with careful consideration. It's website doesn't do this place any justice. You simply have to see it for yourself.

name: Bonnie Miller
text: Horrible owners...take your business somewhere else.

name: Alicia Kier
text:
Was with a friend today she was trying to cheer me up. I've been sick from surgery. We had stopped to get a bite to eat at the grocery store. She said something about the new bead store next door. She had never been in there and I hadn't either.
Sooo Soon we went in i was so excited.  As soon as I almost got to really looking the lady working the store ask us to place our bags on the counter. Then proceeded to inform us that she would not want anyone to go to jail. It kinda stunned me for a minute.  Then I assured that last that I was not worried about going to jail because I don't steal. My friend wanted to stay. It made me mad I'll never ever go back.
I  suggest the install better security systems or something. I also do wonder does she actually really ask everyone that comes through her doors to put there bags on the counter.  Lady put a sign on the door so people will know before they even enter your store.
Alicia Chappell
USAF Disabled Veteran serv con
Desert Shield Desert Storm
AGE 48

resp.text: I apologize that you were somehow offended by our new policy.  We are a relatively new, family owned business and just had our first shoplifter a few days ago and are feeling violated and vulnerable.  The joke made about not wanting to send all our customers to jail was a light-hearted attempt to make the best of an uncomfortable situation.  We hoped that our customers would be more understanding on why we have to have these new policies.  Like you said, One person has to ruin it for everyone.  Hope you're feeling better, and thank you for your service.

name: Granny Clampett
text:
So glad I found this place! Excellent choices on more than just leather/beads! Beautiful monograming, patches to order!
I know people who come from LA,TX, even Seattle! Folks there are Awesome!

name: Rick Mowdy
text:
These people ROCK!
They're the best.

name: Annie Taylor
text: They must not be open anymore. I have tried to call and have left voice messages with no return calls or maybe they changed the number if anyone knows please let me know.

name: Michele bolton
text: We love this place ,they're  friendly ,their prices are very reasonable and affordable

name: Woodhouse
text: The best place and customer service you will ever find not to mention  the quality of the work

name: Carl Cronin
text: Great staff, quality work at a great price!

name: Willis
text: Neat place.  They have a great selection of patches, from public service, military, to bike clubs.

name: Scott Allen
text: Great service !

name: Mary Palmer
text: Nice, neat shop. Very friendly atmosphere. The owners are interested in their work.

name: Jesse Holland
text: Top notch service & excellent craftsmanship as well. Highly recommend them for all leather work! She made me a custom leather holster for my derringer that mounted to my bike for SIGNIFICANTLY less than I expected to pay. Will definitely be back! Nice job guys!

name: Rev. BOSS
text: Theresa and Tommy....good people. Beads and Leather ...a great shop. Weather its a minor alteration or a custom job. These guys have the skills.

name: mark harbison
text: So freaking awesome!    They were able to repair my leather jacket I haven't worn in two years because of my dog.  It looks cooler now than it did before I brought it in.  Very reasonable and the nicest people !

name: Barney Monteleone
text: Great folks. Quality workmanship!!!!!

name: Eric C.
text: The Owner's of this establishment, are well known within the bike community, and their work is Outstanding. I recommend ANYONE that has an old vest/leather riding jacket needing "new life" to it or if you want to get a new one; go to Beads and Leather. 👍👍👍

name: Carmen Wilson
text: Friendly and extremely  knowledgeable  about leather crafting. Great prices, a selection of patches, vests and items you don't know know you even needed until you see them here!

name: Wayne Gray
text: Very nice people and good service.

name: Mark Allsup
text: Great place and excellent service!.. they made a custom patch for me ...very happy and will be back for more!

name: Jo Kincaid
text: The work was amazing it just was a long time to get it done but worth the wait for a handmade to order leather 50 dollar  wallet that will last a lifetime.

name: Juan Porter
text: Great people Great quality work

name: Katheryn Jost
text: Great people. Great work! And fast.

name: Randy Brown
text: They fixed my handle on my guitar case did a wonderful job

name: Michael Thompson
text: The customer service that the staff provided was exceptional. I had several questions to go along with my unique order and the staff helped me customize my selections ro achieve exactly what I was looking for. The attention to detail was astounding! Craftmanship and quality of the leather products that I purchased was second to none. I highly recommend this establishment for anyone seeking a truly professionally made leather product.

name: michael mounsey
text: Best custom jobs ever, great people to be around, and a large selection of leathers to choose from. Love this store....

name: Krista “KK” Mounsey
text: Love stopping in here! They do a great job with patches and have a decent selection of motorcycle helmets & stuff!

name: Michael Howard
text: Friendly  People and really nice work

name: MILO BROWN
text: Been getting leather repaired from these kind folks  for three years now. Most reasonable prices, courteous, timely, and proficient shop I've experienced form coast to coast, border to border. Thanks.

name: Veronica Stewart
text: Very nice folks ! And welling to help you with how too , great selection on leather for your needs !! Plus I'm all for the mom and pop's stores, so y'all go check em out !!!

name: James Keyes
text: My experience with beads and leather is always great. They really pay attention to what I want and always come through

name: Micheal Buckalew
text: Great people to do business with, great service and professional quality craftmanship

name: Hudson Mcgallagher
text: Fast ,work done at a reasonable price

name: Mary Swendson
text: Supper nice very reasonable great place to shop

name: Jake Butler
text: Quick and Excellent Work 👍

name: Christy Owens
text: Wonderful and helpful local business

name: Kevin Whiting
text: Great people great service

name: Ellis Foster
text: Good place to shop

name: Jon Bass
text: Terrible experience. What they told me multiple times would be a couple days, took 2 weeks. Never again.

name: Rosia Gibbs
text: Excellent work

name: Tim Moser
text: Best leather repair in town

name: Delece Bowers
text: great place

name: Claudia Charley
text: Because I'm a quilter, for me it carries the greatest variety of fabric choices from Prince to solids. The coupon deals are a plus. I always save a great deal on my purchases.

name: Kimberly Coast
text:
Overall, excellent shopping experience, and knowledgeable staff. I appreciated having an  electronic cart after my Stroke, although the aisles were JUST barely big enough for it to Navigate. Beware of Displays and Stockers blocking open areas.
Store is well organized overall, well stocked, and had a better selection than the big box competition. Including the high end sewing machines that I have only recently learned about.
They DO have an App and Website where you can order, then pick up at the local store.
As I am new to the idea, I will probably drag myself in to select materials, for now.

name: cartress jackson
text: JoAnn Fabrics is a great place to go if you are shopping for fabric and patterns. The staff is very friendly and helpful if its something they don't carry they will try to help you with finding what you need.

name: margieforchrist
text: I found most of the staff to be short and not very helpful. When I asked for help, I was told they did not carry the type of fabric I was looking for, but after a couple minutes of hunting on my own, I found an entire display with the specific type of fabric. Great selection but disappointing service.

name: Victoria Wine
text: Organized and roomy. The lines were a little long, but they were well stocked.

name: Jeremy Fisher
text: I absolutely love this location! It's in my neighborhood and the staff is very knowledgeable and courteous!

name: Brenda Baumgart
text: Love shopping here but I bought remnants of fleece that were folded up and wrapped where you couldn't look at it and when I opened several of them, they were a yard long but not much width to use like I wanted and needed. They should have it where you can actually look at it and see what your actually buying. Other than that, it's a great place to shop.

name: Nicholas Moody
text: JOANN has a wide selection of different art supplies. From fabric and patterns, to heat pens for doing gold leaf, to Cricut machines and supplies, to organizational supplies and home decor, to even more.

name: Ashley Dominguez
text: Absolutely love shopping here. They have a great selection of crafting items; from fabric to kids art supplies and everything in between and their prices are very reasonable as well.

name: Bridget Steele
text: My package was brought to my car fast

name: Helen
text: Helpful  employees  and clean neat store.

name: Carol Bennett-Sharbel
text: I’m so happy every time I go here. I think I’m going to get addicted to this store!

name: Katrina Kynard
text: The people are always helpful and nice

name: Meg Stroh
text: Clean facility. It was difficult to determine where the line started and the two female cashiers were rude.

name: Kassandra Holmes
text: Love going here but you have to pay attention to prices when checking out. Seems they make up prices at checkout especially on clearance items.

name: kyle hicks
text: Seems the prices have gone up significantly, well I guess thats what we get for fighting for higher wages.

name: Purrito 38
text: I come here with my mother for projects I help her out with on a very often occurrence. The people here are so nice and they help you getting just the right fabrics and the other things they have. 10/10

name: Paula Curbow
text: They were busy but they took care of everyone as quickly as possible. The cashier was friendly as well as the people cutting the fabric. They had a great sale but I still couldn't use that great coupon because just about everything was "on sale."

name: Andrew Farrow
text: Pretty good selections and decent prices. The only annoying thing is it can be hard to find a staff member to provide assistance if you need it.

name: Dave Dismukes
text: Great service and helpful tips with questions we asked.

name: Abranette Jackson
text: They're very helpful in here even at close to closing time. Very knowledgeable. I will be back often.

name: Telisa Bennett
text: Love, love this store! I always overspend and enjoy it....if you are looking for sewing or craft supplies or something pretty, this is the place for you.

name: Michael Graham
text: Great customer service  cloth cutter was awesome!!!!

name: jojoyful1
text: Always enjoy shopping here.  Selection is the best

name: James Marinos
text: Lady that help me with very nice and very helpful

name: Tammy Smyly
text: Great selection of products, great prices, great employees, and definitely tons of new ideas for future projects. 😁

name: Teresa Valencia
text: Yiu can find all tou need and best prices and quality

name: Beth Leach
text: Andrea was fantastic when we checked out!!!   Great service.

name: Ardy Gee
text: Its a little to pricey for me but if Michaels or Hobby Lobby doesn't have it you can bet Jo-Ann's does.

name: Mattie Walker (Safari)
text: I love shopping there. They have good products. I find alot of my jewerly needs there.

name: TeDarius Forrest
text: Worst place my wife has dragged me in recently....she absolutely loved it there...

name: LaTanya Millhouse
text: They had everything I needed & Good customer service

name: Gwendolyn Treptow
text: They always have great craft and sewing supplies! Something is always on sale and the staff is very helpful.

name: Jane Gibbons
text: They had pinking shears like my Mom used Only place near me where I could find them Store also had sent me via text a 60 percent off coupon Great experience

name: Lacey Byers
text: Great selection of craft supplies and fabric. Some home decor and floral.

name: Merrilyn Cook
text: I usually really like Joann Fabrics, but there were not many fabrics in stock. It seemed that many fabrics were not plentiful. I'm not sure if Covid has caused this shortage or not, but it made shopping very difficult.

name: sarita Holmes
text: One of my favorite places

name: Dottie Broadhead
text: Drove an hour one way for fabric and a spool of thread to finish a Christmas project. Drove an hour home; opened the bag and no thread. Store gave me a credit over the phone but lost at least a day on the project and will have to go out again for thread. Useless employees.

name: Courtney Shevchenko
text: Everyone is always super-friendly! Great experience!

name: Krys McClellan
text: Joann Fabrics has what I need 9 times out of 10, and since they've started carrying more cosplay crafting materials I have no doubt it can become my local one stop shop for almost everything. Found the perfect material to make an Outlander-inspired dress this past Halloween!

name: Stephen Moss
text:
We went looking for material to recover six dining chairs. Could not believe both the quantity and quality of the selection.

Literally rows of fantastic options in both printed and woven heavy upholstery grade fabrics.

Since our our yard needs are low, we had the option of fifty plus remnant bolts discounted 60%.

Staff was happily helpful and knowledgeable.

name: Ashley W
text: I love Joann fabrics! The staff here is also awesome!

name: Kassandra Larson
text: Solid choice. Fabric section is cramped but they carry the expected fabrics.

name: Step East
text: I go to JoAnn's a lot with my friend, Denise, because she spends her spare time painting, sewing, journaling, making candles and jewelry, etc. and she is always on the hunt for new ideas, inspiration, and materials. We usually find what she's looking for at JoAnn's in Hoover. The employees are very customer service oriented and knowledgeable.. they don't mind answering questions or giving you a hand. I'll definitely be back!

name: Annie Robinson
text:
Experience was great, cashier was very nice.
But as we all know with covid-19 a lot of things they did not have at the time.

name: Juicy
text: Great fabric selection!

name: Pumpkin
text: Stoped by this location today. And I had not checked the time. Stopped in=

name: Amanda Rhodes
text: Great service checking out but could not get hep on the floor

name: Maria Enriquez
text: The store feels empty and expensive

name: Jane Jordan
text: The ladies in the FABRIC DEPARTMENT RAN THAT LINE VERY QUICKLY AND WERE VERY POLITE

name: Joanna Nix
text: They have a great selection of fabrics, yarn and a lot of other stuff. I like the organization and cleanliness of the store and convenience and definitely the coupons!! Their coupons are the best.

name: Ora “SWEETIE” Davis
text: I have been in here a lot lately I'm making my granddaughter a quilt, so I've been picking fabric and threads and so on. Love the employee there they are so friendly and helpful. Keep up the good work everybody.

name: Janet
text: Joan Fabrics; Is a great store they seem to have most of the things I'm looking for. I just wish I didn't have to go to Hoover to get there. I live in Trussville,Al. And I have to get someone to drive me there. God Bless Joan Fabrics. I would love apply for a job if they built one here in Trussville.

name: Jacqueline Williams
text: Great customer service

name: Melanie H
text: They have great sales and coupons. It's always easy to find the crafting, sewing, and paper crafts I enjoy AND the carry The Happy Planner by MAMBI (Me and My Big Ideas)!

name: Vickie Crowell
text: Great DIY's material for making great gifts

name: Jessie Bunton
text: The store was fairly busy, but orderly and social distance was being adhered to. The employees all had on masks and were moving quickly to help customers, though there was a bit of a wait to cut fabric.

name: Carter Strother
text: While I was there customer had mask ,& social distance was awesome

name: Dorothy Guillory
text: Joann fabrics located in Hoover Is having A After Christmas sale! Mask WAS being worn by staff and also customer! There was no limit of customers that could enter the STORE AT THE same time! That was one of my concern.

name: Wanda Webb-Moore
text: I LOVE THE DOORBUSTER DEALS!!!

name: Emma Lugin
text: Kathleen was at the fabric cutting area and was doing ABSOLUTELY NOTHING and I walked up with my mother to get some fabrics cut and she proceeded to completely ignore us for five minutes until another employee walked by and told us to take a number. After taking a number it still took her about two more minutes to acknowledge us to which she asked us if we were ready, once replying that we were ready, SHE IGNORED US FOR ANOTHER FEW MINUTES. She finally cut our fabrics and it was the WORST experience I have ever had at a JoAnn’s. The customer service was great embarrassing and could be made such a joke it could be on SNL.

name: Kathy Green
text: The support you offering to all the communities you are in by supplying and cutting materials to make medical masks is nothing short of spectacular. Thank you for the commitment you have.

name: Pepsi Cola
text: I see and crochet and this palce is right 4 choosing different shades of things among other stuff

name: Faith Destiny Center Christian Church
text: AWESOME CHURCH SERVICE

name: Lori Hall
text: Clean store. Prices were responsible, employees knowledgeable on different questions I asked

name: April Walker
text: The employees seem nice and knowledgeable. I personally feel that their prices are a little higher than other craft stores in the area but still competitive. The only way to get their coupons is to download their app and create an account which I'm not a fan of. Other than that they have really cute decor and pretty much everything for your crafting or sewing needs.

name: Kayla Hoover
text: Who doesn’t love joanns??? This location is always organized and pretty well stocked on items. Never met a rude or unhelpful employee. Even during the crazy rush or super sale days they maintain patients and professionalism.

name: Lillie Burroughs
text: Just enjoy coming into the store. I can always find something to buy.

name: Norman Virciglio
text: Awesome place for fabrics and sewing supplies

name: P 2
text:
Love going to Joann!
Friendly and helpful associates.
I always have a great experience when I go there.

name: Cheryl Henderson
text: I stopped in for the Christmas sales and there were many the crafts were very nice the ready made Christmas ornaments and cards and everything else we're really pretty that's a good place to visit and browse sometimes you see something that you're not looking for but you need and or want.

name: DJ Dansby
text: It's one my go to for last minute craft project shopping.   You'll find everything you need for craft projects and some cute seasonal home decor!

name: Felicia L Roberts
text:
The selection offered here is amazing. Thus the 2 stars.

I am a professional seamstress and have been here repeatedly, due to necessity, and in hopes that the customer service would improve.

The employees that I encounter, display an openly negative attitude. When I'm spending my money, the vibe I get from the place that is collecting my money should not be, " OMG please go away".

I'm the future, my business with Joann fabrics will be done online.

name: Lynn Blackwell
text: Only  place to find good material.  Most of the employees are helpful

name: Andi Smith
text: Combine coupons and get amazing discounts on all sorts of sewing and craft essentials. I love this location although it's a little small and are out of things I need more often than not. Still a great amount of fabric to choose from tho.

name: Jodie Bilbrey
text: I went in today and wanted to purchase some rotary blades which were all in a locked display. After walking through the entire store, I found a clerk in the back who was placing bolts of fabric back on the shelf. I asked if she could assist me by unlocking the cabinet with the blades so I could buy them. She turned to me and said “ I will after my break” and then she walked behind the fabric counter and picked up more fabric bolts to return to the shelves!  I was so dumbfounded I was speechless. I promptly left the store and found what I needed at Hobby Lobby where they are more polite and helpful to their customers.

name: Shelia Dearing
text:
The person at the material spot was so rude. The other lady that  was w as iting with me rang the bell 3 times and she finally came over there. She snapped at me because she said the material I had was  on a cardboard and I  told her that I  picked it up just like that and she  argued with me  saying that it was on a cardboard yes it was.
I could not believe how she talked to customers. I will  not go back.

name: S Hairston
text: I love this place because it has everything planner related and paper crafting. You can use coupons. Who doesn't love that. Service is always top notch

name: Colette Muncher
text: Caution:This store is habit forming😍🙋‍♀️ Just go have fun... there is something for everyone! Discover "your thing"! #isoundlikeanad🤦‍♀️

name: Norman Virciglio
text: Awesome place for fabrics and sewing supplies

name: Shelia Dearing
text:
The person at the material spot was so rude. The other lady that  was w as iting with me rang the bell 3 times and she finally came over there. She snapped at me because she said the material I had was  on a cardboard and I  told her that I  picked it up just like that and she  argued with me  saying that it was on a cardboard yes it was.
I could not believe how she talked to customers. I will  not go back.

name: Shannon Meads
text: Absolutely love this place. They have the best prices around and don't forget your coupon. Also, they have special online prices so you can order online and pick-up in the store.

name: Patricia Weaver
text: The associate that helped me find a price for the fabric I wanted was great. While the line was long it moved quickly.

name: Jodie Bilbrey
text: I went in today and wanted to purchase some rotary blades which were all in a locked display. After walking through the entire store, I found a clerk in the back who was placing bolts of fabric back on the shelf. I asked if she could assist me by unlocking the cabinet with the blades so I could buy them. She turned to me and said “ I will after my break” and then she walked behind the fabric counter and picked up more fabric bolts to return to the shelves!  I was so dumbfounded I was speechless. I promptly left the store and found what I needed at Hobby Lobby where they are more polite and helpful to their customers.

name: Bonlynren McG
text: I LOVE THIS STORE!  I have been sewing since I was 12 and I'm nearly 69 now. Their selection of fabrics is fantastic!  The only reason  I'm not giving them a 5 is because they way overpriced  their fabrics. The customer service was really good and the ladies very helpful!

name: Tara King
text: It’s a smaller store, so don’t look for extensive variety. Despite the smaller store than usual, there is a good variety in types of products sold. But, expect friendly and helpful staff.

name: doris boston
text: Nice fabrics can be too pricey.

name: Melissa Sisk
text: I work with a nonprofit organization, Threads of Love, and buy a lot of fabric and yarn. Every time I visit I receive the best service. All team members are patient and help me get the most bang for my buck. I will gladly recommend the Hoover, Al location.

name: shirley burns
text: That is my type of place I love the sew and I love to geting things from there

name: YellaHammr ArdyG
text: I loved it.  It had different stuff from Michaels. very interesting store, I will be going back. 2 thumbs up

name: Bonlynren McG
text: I LOVE THIS STORE!  I have been sewing since I was 12 and I'm nearly 69 now. Their selection of fabrics is fantastic!  The only reason  I'm not giving them a 5 is because they way overpriced  their fabrics. The customer service was really good and the ladies very helpful!

name: doris boston
text: Nice fabrics can be too pricey.

name: Mona Baylor
text: I came to Joann's fabrics 8weeks in a row looking for No Split  4mm jump rings to make bracelets and was their Friday August 7th. Still no jump rings no split.

name: KD Burchfield
text: Clean, well organized, great sales and very good/fast checkout.

name: Darla McMullen
text: They have an amazing array of fabrics and related supplies. I was looking for crochet and knitting info and supplies - selection not as good. Spoke with 4 different employees - 1 some sort of mgr could barely manage to bother helping - she directed me to the wrong section because she didn't bother to listen. 2&3 stock clerks were very helpful and friendly. 4 cashier - very nice, helpful, the best! Amount of clerks seemed a bit low.

name: Joseph Black
text: Extremely helpful and kind employees.

name: Linda Gosa
text: I always enjoy shopping at this store.  It is very well organized and carries some interesting decorating items as well as fabric.  The staff is professional and efficient.  A special thanks to Nikki at the check out counter for going the extra mile to help me with my purchase.

name: Stephanie Newman
text: Great place to get craft supplies. Sometimes a long wait to get fabric cut but that's to be expected.

name: Jamillia Jones
text: Friendly staff that's willing to help

name: Nancy Stephens
text: Large selection of fabrics available. Very crowded, but lines were moving quickly. Employees were very helpful and friendly.

name: Angelika Boyd (AyeeJayy)
text: Placed 2 orders for pick up in store and had my fiancé go pick them up. They were ready on the same day. My fiancé was only given 1 order then first time he went in. Went back the next day and was given someone else’s order after the girl CONFIRMED my name and his. Now a third trip will have to be made to the store. Called and spoke to a manager who offered no apology and simply stated my other order was still there and could be picked up. Horrible customer service and employees who don’t pay attention.

name: ink Demon
text: Love this Joanne fabrics. Wish it was closer to home. Love material selection. It's my go to place for quilting fabric.

name: Elizabeth Carlisle
text: They seem to be catering to crafts and reducing fabrics (especially garment fabric). They have a large supply of quilting fabric

name: Pastor Sam Baker
text: Found the item I wanted here and at half the price where I seen it in other places!!!😇

name: Jeanette Davis
text: I like Joanns Fabrics but customer service is not one of their strong suits. I sew for a living but I prefer to drive an hour away to get better materials and service than I get from here. They seem to have a big turnover as I have gone at different times of the day and there are always new or different people.

name: Beth C
text: The sales associates are overworked but helpful and friendly. You just might have to wait a bit. Has a better selection for yarn craft than Michael's, if only because their section is twice as large. Needle section is very limited for sock knitting.

name: Kerry Stober
text:
The store was well organized and I found what I needed without any trouble. Lots of great fabrics to choose from. Easy to get to the location from the interstate.
I feel like a couple more employees wouldn't hurt this location. I had to wait about 20 minutes to get one piece of fabric cut and then the line at the register was also very long because there was only one (very nice gentleman) employee stationed up there. Maybe I came during an unusually busy time but they seemed understaffed.

name: Paula Floyd
text: I needed tan buttons.  The shelf supply was very limited in quantity of same size buttons. I also needed a small amount of upholstery fabric. I found price to be a little high. I wish Hancock Fabrics was still competition for Joann's. Also no Accuguides available in the store.

name: Jesse Wilson
text: Very friendly environment. The workers made me feel very comfortable and helped me find exactly what I needed. Everything was easy to find and well organized.

name: Susan Davis
text: Had what I needed, friendly service and fast checkout.

name: Feona Harris
text: The ladies were really nice N helping me and my daughter find her some zebra print fabric for her custom curtains.

name: Olivia Ja
text: Great customer service, very helpful and polite.

name: Belle Burns
text: Cute Traveller Notebooks

name: Cyndi LaFond
text: Great sale today

name: Zina H
text: I Didn't Visit Their

name: kiante johnson
text: Excellent customer service. Despite primarily being a fabric store its art material selection is very good. Very good sales on findings such as 'bogo'. All of my creative friends tell me how good a store it is and now i know for myself.

name: carla smith
text: Love everything about this store 💗

name: Jill Smitherman
text: Great sales on holiday decor! Buy 1 get 3 free! Wow!!

name: Janie Moffatt
text: So much good stuff!

name: Julia G.
text: I was disappointed they didn't have many cross stitch patterns. But they have a good selection of fabric.

name: Carey Cauthen
text: It's a good store, and I generally find what I need there. Staff is very friendly; store is always clean and will lit. Sometimes the lines get a little long (both for fabric citing and for paying). Sign up for coupons and you can really save $$$.

name: Thomas Rolen
text: Great selection of fabrics, but staff wasn't. Very helpful.

name: Sunshine
text: Poor customer service. It was my first time in this store and I had a new customer coupon. I was not aware of the exclusions, and the cashier up front, Nicki, was very impatient with me. She insisted on moving on to other tasks and did not offer to explain the policy or what I could get.

name: Kathryn Palmer
text: Decent selection, but poor store layout and difficulty finding staff. One of those really long lines leading up to several registers. I love crafting stuff but I felt uncomfortable in this store.

name: Petra Leonard
text: Great prices!

name: Susan Smith
text: I had a copy of their ad and ask the cashier if I had the correct merchandise. She s as I'd yes and rang them up at a different price. After a lot of attitude from her, she returned my order and then rang it up correctly

name: Courtney Carter
text: I was coming from about 45 minutes away and called to ask them if they had printable vinyl in stock, she put me on hold for a few seconds and told me that they didn't, it would be tomorrow. I was already on my way, so stopped by there anyways just to look for myself and they had plenty in stock available. I think she should have actually checked seeing that I wasn't local and was driving a ways to get the stuff and could have turned around and it was there all along.

name: Kyung Kim
text: Very good service.

name: KIMBERly Richardson
text: Great place

name: Karon S.
text: If u do alot of sewing or crafts . This is a good places

name: Michael Giera
text: Awesome place, great variety

name: Gary Murphree
text: Great staff

name: Casey Hughes
text: Great selection but really need to have more people working registers up front.

name: Michelle Jernigan
text: Found everything I needed and then some. Glad to have found this place

name: denita mincey
text: The store was clean and well organized. Prices were very satisfying and the staff was knowledgeable and helpful.

name: Stephanie Kareotes
text:
This rating is for the last two weeks including today. Where has all your fleece fabric gone? You used to have a whole wall of fleece fabric. I come in once a week... I do quite a few fleece tie blankets and your inventory keeps getting lower and lower.  When I ask why, your staff says they have no idea when they're getting fabric... that doesn't really help me:/
I really don't want to order online. I'd rather come to your store but it looks like I have no option. I would like to have some indication of when you will fill up with more fleece fabric. I have been making trips to the store for the last month with little luck. Could you please tell me what is going on and when you will be getting the inventory you used to have. I would really appreciate it. Thank you so much.

name: Lexus LaPortiaye Lush
text: I loved Joann's...I deff necesitto 2 go there more often, because I had no idea they had some different things that I would've thought 2 only find N Michael's OR Hobby Lobby...plus I found my "zebra print material" I was lOokin 4 "Yaaaaay." (GramExclusives)@Lethal_Lushis_Lexus

name: Felicia Wilson
text: First time there, went to the counter for assistance. The employee walked away to answer a phone. As I stood there no one informed me that I needed to pull number. Once pulled number I got the same employee who was no assistance at all. I asked where I could find the materials and she pointed to the back of the store. A nice customer who was standing there at the time walked me over the area and help me find what I needed.. I really appreciated the customer's help. I will not be back.

name: LeeAnne
text: Great selections. More than other craft stores however more expensive!

name: Ashlynn Koontz
text: I went to buy supplies for a sewing class at my university. I told an attendant I needed help with my purchase. She spent less time helping me and more time trying to sell me overpriced and unneeded products.

name: Katherine Puckett
text: I love the store, but waiting for an hour to get a piece cloth cut is totally ridiculous! The store was busy, but 2 ladies cutting fabric and 1 checkout person!!!! unbelievable!!!

name: Robin Lewis
text: Just enjoy stopping in for something and enjoy seeing all the great ideas and items they have displayed. I love their floral section, crafts ideas and fabrics.

name: Belinda Henson
text: Large inventory and employees are always helpful!

name: Corinthean Mitchell
text: I always love shopping at Joanns.  They have a great yarn selection.  I would suggest investing in more than one motorized shopping cart for people with disabilities.

name: Donald Claborn
text: The staff is always helpful and courteous

name: Emily thehuman
text: Easy to get in and out. They offer so much more than just fabric, also accept coupons!

name: Stacy Mosley.
text: NICE PLACE. REASONABLE PRICES

name: Leslie Coggin
text: The store was a mess and it was hard to maneuver through the aisles. Several aisles were really torn up, like the bpok aisle amd knit/crochet pattern aisle where there were stacks of books on the base deck.

name: connie McArthur
text: Always find what I'm going for.

name: Michele Reavis
text: Good selection, had a good sale going. Spent too much.

text: Lots of great deals and sales. Easy entrance and parking. Clean store Not enough help.

text: This place has everything i need

text: I love Joann and their awesome sales!

name: C Way
text: They have the best selection around

name: laurie lawson
text: Knowledgeable staff but workers are sparse(ok at the least hard to find). Great selection of fabric

name: Denise
text: The clerk Andrea was fabulous.

name: Justin Marden
text: Nice employees and easy to navigate layout of the store. Prices are a bit high, but that's not specific to this store. Joann's in general is slightly overpriced.

name: Debbie Miller Pyper
text: They have everything I need. Great prices.

name: Starla Karns
text: Way more expensive than the California stores

name: Ka'Terria Kelly
text: A bit pricey but they have very pretty fabrics, I bought some to decorate for my baby shower.

name: Trinity Hare
text: I experienced some of the worst customer service today at the fabric counter! As a seamstress I spend quite a bit of money in this particular location and have never experienced such racial discrimination as I did today. I will never shop at this location again and I am happily driving to Tuscaloosa because I refuse to be treated disrespectfully and continue to patronize a business. If you dont want to service customers find another job other than a job working with the public!!

name: Bill Tiemann
text: If you're looking for fabric and sewing needs or craft materials this is the place to go in Hoover.

name: Matthew Cook
text: My wife cuts vinyl, and at the time of this post they have a good sale going on.

name: Shannon Lukens
text: Honestly some of the worst customer service I've ever received. If I acted like these employees I would be fired at my job. The first two employees I asked where something was located said they didn't know where and walked away. The third employee I asked actually called to others in the store and was given the response, somewhere in the jewelry section. No one offered us to help find what we needed or gave us the most basic information. Went to Michael's instead and got great customer service.

name: mom of boys
text: I have a love/hate relationship with joanns. I feel prices are high and everything is always on sale so you cant use coupons...also never can use coupons on any cutting machine materials.

name: Barbara Pulliam
text: Love the selection of fabric here and visit every time I am in town.

name: Cheryl Requena
text: Some things were pricey. I could get from walmart

name: Judy Smith
text: Had a bad experience. All the sales they advertise are a spoof. I don't want to receive their texts anymore.

name: S Hall
text: Awful. Just awful. A wide selection of calico, fleece, and flannel. If you quilt, it's great. If you sew clothing, you'll have to buy your linen, wool, and silk online..save yourself the trip.

text: I just spent 10+ minutes on hold on the phone before someone picked up and put me on hold AGAIN for 10 more minutes!! I work in retail and there should be no excuse to not answer the phone. I had one simple question that would've taken all of 20 seconds to answer.

text: They have a very good and quality selection

text: Huge selection and friendly employees

name: Matthew T
text: First time in this store, looked well stocked and maintained

name: Ayla Thacker (Evas World)
text: Awesome selection, not as varied as Michael's or Hobby Lobby, but that's because it DOES focus on fabrics, and so has a HUGE selection of fabrics to choose from, and accessories, as well.

name: S Vasseur
text: Good for crafts, wish had more selection as some items need to go to other shops, all staff friendly though

name: Michal Shar
text: Very good selection of fabrics and notions and a good sale on sewing machines.

name: Lloyd Rafalsky
text:
MY CHURCH BOUGHT 400 PLUS YARDS FROM YOUR STORE IN HOOVER, ALABAMA. THE MANAGER, TONY, COULD NOT HAVE BEEN NICER AND SPENT MANY HOURS DOING THE CUTTING FOR US IN A ROOM THAT WAS NOT WHERE WE HAD TO WAIT IN LINE,,,THIS IS NOT THE FIRST TIME HE  HAS TAKEN HIS TIME TO DO THIS FOR OUR CHURCH AND IS SO NICE TO WORK WITH.... IF THERE WAS A BOLT OF FABRIC WE COULDN'T REACH, HE WOULD GET A LADDER AND CLIMB UP AND GET IT FOR US...HE NEVER COMPLAINED AND WE WERE ALL THERE PROBABLY 5-6 HOURS!
THIS MAN IS KIND AND RESPECTABLE TO HIS WORKERS WHICH IS NOT ALWAYS THE CASE. THERE IS ESPECIALLY ONE WOMAN IN THERE THAT ACTS LIKE IT IS AN IMPOSITION TO WAIT ON YOU  OR CHECK YOU OUT AT THE REGISTER AND DOESN'T SEEM TO KNOW HOW TO TREAT THE CUSTOMER; BUT OVERALL THE GIRLS WORKING THERE ARE GREAT!
MY POSITION IS THAT IF YOU DON'T LIKE PEOPLE AND DON'T WANT TO INTERACT WITH THEM, THEN DON'T WORK IN RETAIL!
I HOPE THE CORPORATE OFFICE WILL GET THIS, AND GIVE TONY THE PRAISE HE DESERVES...HE IS DOING AN EXCELLENT JOB FOR THEM.
I FORGOT TO MENTION ANOTHER DAY LAST WEEK I WAS IN THE STORE MY MYSELF AND BOUGHT TOO MUCH FLEECE TO CARRY  TO MY CAR.
AGAIN, TONY SAID I COULD PULL AROUND TO THE FRONT OF THE STORE AND HE WOULD LOAD IT UP FOR ME...HE VOLUNTEERED THIS WITHOUT ME ASKING!  YOU HAVE A FINE MAN WORKING FOR YOU, AND I HOPE THAT JOANNS APPRECIATES HIM AS MUCH AS WE DO!
THANK YOU,
GAIL RAFALSKY
HOOVER, ALABAMA

text: I really love this store for the products.  But aside from the products, this store can be frustrating.  There isn't anyone on the floor to help or answer questions. They need price check scanners through out the floor to help customers since they do not have anyone on the floor. Be prepared to stand in line when checking out.  Also, whoever is checking you out will most likely be have to answer the phone and deal with customer service issues at the same time.

I asked one question about whereabouts of the sewing pattern and the employee just walked off, not bothering to help. It's extremely disheartening as a beginning apparel design student who has to drive 45 minutes to this location just to get supplies and no assistance whatsoever from the employees here!
